biotools.summary: The software was developed to support functional and comparative genome analysis. It provides the visualization of automatically obtained metabolic networks based on KEGG database information and stores the generated data in standardized SBML format. SBML is an open source XML-based format that facilitates the description of models and their exchange between various simulation and analysis tools.

bioschemas.name: CARMEN
